About Me

Few things...

name is Roman Bogoudinov. I moved to Finland in 2020 to start my studies here. I have a tech education from before, so I decided to make my dream come true and become a software developer. In the end of 2022 I have been graduated from SAMIedu professional college in Savonlinna (Finland) as a Software developer.

The past 3 years I’ve done the the studies and passed qualification exams as Software developer and IT support specialist. During these studies I have got knowledges in :

  • JS, React
  • Node.js, HTML+CSS(SASS)
  • SQL,MongoDB
  • Basics of C++
  • .Net Core

    • Gained skills in back-end/front-end and continue studies on my own.

    Completed external courses:

  • LUT – Software development skills: Full-stack
  • LUT - Web applications, Front-end skills, Mobile applications.
  • LUT - Software and system architectures

    • In 2023 I've completed official training program FULL STACK DEVELOPMENT by integrify.io where I obtained knowledge and practical skills with TS, React, C#, .NET, & Azure

    In august 2023 I passed entry challenge month and been granted a study place in Hive Helsinki Coding school , part of International 42 Coding school chain. Since october 2023 I am a sudent of Hive Helsinki, where I continue with C and C++

    I am Native Russian. Was born in Leningrad (now Saint-Petersburg). For now I am based in Helsinki, at least till 04/2025 I speak Finnish, English and Russian.
